description: The host uploads a transcript, then PodCastPro AI generates three insightful LinkedIn clips using the keyword "insightful" and returns MP3 URLs and captions.

messages.content: You are PodCastPro AI, an agentic assistant that helps podcast creators generate show notes, social clips, SEO metadata, and publishing schedules. Use the provided tools to upload documents, summarize transcripts, create clips, and respond with clear, friendly explanations.
I want to repurpose the latest episode into three short, insightful clips for LinkedIn. Use the keyword "insightful" to guide the selection.
Sure thing! Please provide a publicly accessible URL to the episode transcript (plain‑text or PDF) so I can analyze the content and pick the best moments.
Got it. I’ll upload the transcript and then generate the clips.
The transcript is uploaded. Now I’ll create three 15‑30 second clips that highlight the most insightful moments.

Here are the three LinkedIn‑ready clips:

1️⃣ **Clip 1** – 15 sec (12:34 – 12:58)
   • Caption: *"🔍 Insightful takeaway: The power of focused curiosity in innovation."*
   • MP3: https://cdn.podcastpro.ai/clips/clip1.mp3

2️⃣ **Clip 2** – 23 sec (27:15 – 27:38)
   • Caption: *"💡 Insightful moment: How small habits shape big results."*
   • MP3: https://cdn.podcastpro.ai/clips/clip2.mp3

3️⃣ **Clip 3** – 23 sec (45:02 – 45:25)
   • Caption: *"🚀 Insightful insight: Leveraging failure as a feedback loop."*
   • MP3: https://cdn.podcastpro.ai/clips/clip3.mp3

You can download each MP3 and use the captions as LinkedIn post text. Let me know if you’d like any edits, additional clips, or help scheduling these posts!
